This is a vignette example.

## Introduction

This is an introductory guide for the use of `cobalt` in most common scenarios. Three appendices are available for its use with more complicated data scenarios and packages not demonstrated here.^[If none of the examples are working, this may be because `MatchIt`, `twang`, or `WeightIt` are missing. Such issues should be fixed soon.]
